text: Lorenzo Lamas (born January 20, 1958) is an American actor. He is best known for his role of Lance Cumson in the soap opera Falcon Crest (1981–1990). Lamas is also known for his roles as Reno Raines in the crime drama series Renegade (1992–1997), and Hector Ramirez in the soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful (2004–2006). ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California
title: Lorenzo Lamas
